website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to convenience, you can't beat this microwave Easy Pod.
pros: Place fish in the silicon pod with a few tablespoons of broth, juice, or wine, and bake or microwave until done
Remove the fish, and thicken the juices right in the pod for a flavorful sauce

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not perfect either
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cooking eggs in the microwave in my RV. Easy to use and overall not bad, but I was surprised how food sticks to it (never experienced that with silicone before). I notice a bit of a plastic-y taste with the eggs. I think I am going to go back to cooking them in a coffee mug even though the clean up is worse. Just not sure if something is leaching.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Detweiler

customer_reviews.title: Veggies come out perfect in this handy steamer
customer_reviews.text: At this point I have only used this product to steam vegetables, but it does its job to a T. Broccoli comes out tender and green with this handy steamer. I used to use water in a plastic bag, but that usually got messy when the bag popped its seam. No more! This product is no-muss, no-fuss. Add a little lemon juice and garlic to the water in the bottom for some added flavor to your veggies. I can't wait to try something else in this little gem.

product_meta.title: Microwave Vegetable Steamer | Omelet Maker | Fish Poacher | Oven Roaster | Cloche Bread Baker | BPA Free Microwave Cooking | Easy Pod by Cestari Kitchen (Original Easy Pod, Jade Green)
feature_bullets: EASY VEGETABLE STEAMER : Most vegetables cook in under 3 minutes in the microwave with only a tablespoon of added water. Add butter, herbs, and spices before you cook for a tasty steamed dish you can serve right from the pod. No need to struggle with a tipsy basket, pots, and a large quantity of boiling water in a kettle. Think beyond vegetables - you can cook any food that needs to be steamed in this pod, such as a tamale.

EASY OMELET MAKER : Making omelets in the pod is simple! Steam chopped vegetables in the pod, add your eggs and cheese, stir, then microwave for 1-2 minutes for single serving of a fast breakfast on the go.
EASY ROASTER : Use instead of foil or parchment paper to roast chicken, or meat and vegetables in the oven. Pouch ooking produces a moist and flavorful result. Open the pod towards the end to brown

EASY POACHER : Use the pod instead of a pot to poach fish or chicken. Place fish in the silicon pod with a few tablespoons of broth, juice, or wine, and bake or microwave until done. Remove the fish, and thicken the juices right in the microwaveable pod for a flavorful sauce.

NO WORRIES : We've made this cookware to European standards, which are are stricter than those set by the FDA. This is the highest food grade silicone available, which is safe for your family and easy care. It is collapsible and rolls up easily for storage, making this foldable steamer convenient for even small kitchens ; you are protected by Cestari Kitchen's lifetime no questions asked guarantee.
